body:
I was thinking about making a Kohi 1v1 series vs other Avicus players. 

Rules Are: No debuffs & Courtesy (whenever the other person enderpearls          away you leave them alone, this is on both ends). 

If I get enough good quality 1v1s (without server lag and other stpid stuff) I'll make a topic about it containing all the vids. 

If you're interested either reply to the topic or my Skype is in the "About" section of my profile, the sidebar was being stupid so I put it there. Plz tell me your IGN if you Choose to message me over Skype. 

A lot of you probably haven't seen me PvP so we can do an assessment Kohi match to see if you want to 1v1 me or not. I invite players of all skill levels to 1v1, if I get rekt by a good player, I don't care. If I rek a less than average/average player I'm not going to go around bragging about it, I don't care. I'm not going to go around saying so and so sucks, I'm not like that.

replies.body:
it's giving them time to sort out their inventory and heal up again. 
I like this format because when you win you know you won not by taking free hits, but with your own skill so when one of us wins we know we deserved it. 

same with debuffs, i feel like they do the work for you.
